text:
ChAdOx1 nCov-19 Vaccination & autoimmune heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (#VITT ).

16 patients from Germany, Austria and Norway
age: 22-54
sex: 13 F (81%)
time from vaccination: 5-16 days
outcome: 9 fatal (56%)

https://t.co/cZw2BFJeRq

#AstraZeneca #meded #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/UauWvGtuDL
